4.3 Running ''CoopSim''

To run CoopSim, you have to start the executable python file ``CoopSim.py'' in the main installation directory either by double clicking or by changing to the CoopSim directory and entering ``python CoopSim.py'' at the command line.


Eckhart Arnold 2006-10-14
